title: Jeep Compass, Meridian get up to Rs 4.95 lakh year end discounts
description: As the year draws to a close, Jeep India is offering attractive benefits on almost its entire line-up. You can save up to Rs 4.95 lakh on the Compass and Meridian SUVs and up to Rs 12 lakh on the flagship Grand Cherokee. Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to stock availability. Please check with your local dealer for the exact figures. Jeep Compass Save up to Rs 4.70 lakh The Compass is available with benefits of up to Rs 3.15 lakh on select variants. Additionally, Jeep is offering corporate benefits worth Rs 1.40 lakh on MY2024 models and special offers worth Rs 15,000, taking the total up to Rs 4.70 lakh. Priced between Rs 18.99 lakh and Rs 28.33 lakh, the Compass only comes with a 170hp, 2.0-litre diesel engine that has manual and automatic transmission options. Only the top-spec Model S variants get a 4x4 option. Jeep Meridian Save up to Rs 4.95 lakh Jeep is selling the Meridian with benefits of up to Rs 2.80 lakh and additional corporate offers worth Rs 1.85 lakh on MY2024 models, depending on the variant. There’s also a special offer worth Rs 30,000, which takes the total benefits up to Rs 4.95 lakh. Recently, Jeep also introduced a new entry-level 5-seater version of the SUV, and it is currently priced between Rs 24.99 lakh and Rs 38.49 lakh. The Meridian shares its powertrain options with the Compass. Jeep Grand Cherokee Save up to Rs 12 lakh The year-end offers on Jeep’s flagship product in India, the Grand Cherokee SUV, are as high as Rs 12 lakh. The SUV is available only in the fully-loaded Limited (O) trim, priced at Rs 67.50 lakh. The Grand Cherokee has a 2.0-litre, four-cylinder turbo-petrol engine, which produces 272hp and 400Nm of peak torque and is paired to an 8-speed automatic gearbox, sending drive to all four wheels via a four-wheel-drive system. Also See: Tata Harrier, Safari discounts increase up to Rs 2.75 lakh in November Toyota Glanza, Taisor and Hyryder get over Rs 1 lakh year end benefits
author: Saptarshi Mondal
excerpt: Flagship Grand Cherokee SUV is available with benefits of up to Rs 12 lakh.

html:
Flagship Grand Cherokee SUV is available with benefits of up to Rs 12 lakh.

As the year draws to a close, Jeep India is offering attractive benefits on almost its entire line-up. You can save up to Rs 4.95 lakh on the Compass and Meridian SUVs and up to Rs 12 lakh on the flagship Grand Cherokee.

Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to stock availability. Please check with your local dealer for the exact figures.

Jeep Compass

Save up to Rs 4.70 lakh

The Compass is available with benefits of up to Rs 3.15 lakh on select variants. Additionally, Jeep is offering corporate benefits worth Rs 1.40 lakh on MY2024 models and special offers worth Rs 15,000, taking the total up to Rs 4.70 lakh. Priced between Rs 18.99 lakh and Rs 28.33 lakh, the Compass only comes with a 170hp, 2.0-litre diesel engine that has manual and automatic transmission options. Only the top-spec Model S variants get a 4x4 option.

Jeep Meridian

Save up to Rs 4.95 lakh

Jeep is selling the Meridian with benefits of up to Rs 2.80 lakh and additional corporate offers worth Rs 1.85 lakh on MY2024 models, depending on the variant. There’s also a special offer worth Rs 30,000, which takes the total benefits up to Rs 4.95 lakh. Recently, Jeep also introduced a new entry-level 5-seater version of the SUV, and it is currently priced between Rs 24.99 lakh and Rs 38.49 lakh. The Meridian shares its powertrain options with the Compass.

Jeep Grand Cherokee

Save up to Rs 12 lakh

The year-end offers on Jeep’s flagship product in India, the Grand Cherokee SUV, are as high as Rs 12 lakh. The SUV is available only in the fully-loaded Limited (O) trim, priced at Rs 67.50 lakh. The Grand Cherokee has a 2.0-litre, four-cylinder turbo-petrol engine, which produces 272hp and 400Nm of peak torque and is paired to an 8-speed automatic gearbox, sending drive to all four wheels via a four-wheel-drive system.
